artist: Delineator: Jean Baptiste Mauzaisse; Lithographer: François Seraphin Delpech; Painter: After Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn
description: bust length portrait of Rembrandt after a self-portrait; facing right and looking out; wearing coat with fur collar; chain across chest; white collar and soft hat
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

in image in black: Mauzaisse ft.   I Lith de Delpech | below image in pencil: Rembrandt / 2-275
title: Portrait of Rembrandt
